tima: Taxonomically Informed Metabolite Annotation

Source: R/tima-package.R
tima-package.Rd

This package provides the infrastructure to perform Taxonomically Informed Metabolite Annotation.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/taxonomicallyinformedannotation/tima

  • https://taxonomicallyinformedannotation.github.io/tima

  • https://taxonomicallyinformedannotation.github.io/tima-shinylive

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/taxonomicallyinformedannotation/tima/issues
